trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Przedstawia <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> typów do automatyzacji interfejsu użytkownika.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Element skojarzony z tym węzłem równorzędnym automatyzacji.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" /> klasy.

trans-unit.source: Minimizes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.
trans-unit.target: Minimalizuje <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda ustawia <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A> właściwości `true`.

trans-unit.source: An object that is in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obiekt, który znajduje się w <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> skojarzonego z tym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" /> for the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Tworzy <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" /> określonego elementu.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" /> that is associated with the specified item.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" /> skojarzonego z określonego elementu.

trans-unit.source: Restores the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.
trans-unit.target: Przywraca <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda ustawia <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A> właściwości `false`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state, expanded or collapsed, of the control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera stan rozwinięte lub zwinięte formantu, który jest skojarzony z tym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The state of the control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Stan formantu, który jest skojarzony z tym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera typ kontrolki dla <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> skojarzonego z tym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda jest wywoływana przez <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Tab" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Tab" /> Wartość wyliczenia.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera kolekcję elementów podrzędnych <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> skojarzonego z tym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda jest wywoływana przez <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.

trans-unit.source: The child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Elementy podrzędne <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> skojarzonego z tym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A> method returns a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> objects that represent the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.ApplicationMenu%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.QuickAccessToolBar%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> objects that belong to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A> Metoda zwraca kolekcję <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> obiekty reprezentujące <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.ApplicationMenu%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.QuickAccessToolBar%2A>, i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> obiektów, które należą do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera nazwę <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> skojarzonego z tym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda jest wywoływana przez <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.

trans-unit.source: The type name of the associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.
trans-unit.target: Nazwa typu skojarzonego <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Wyliczenie wartość określająca wzorca formantu.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera wzorzec kontroli <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> skojarzony z <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsCollapsed" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> is <see langword="false" /> and <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Selection" /> value, this method returns an object that supports the control pattern; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsCollapsed" /> właściwość <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> jest <see langword="false" /> i <paramref name="patternInterface" /> jest <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, lub <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Selection" /> wartość, ta metoda zwraca obiekt, który obsługuje wzorca formantu; w przeciwnym razie wartość <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" /> is off the screen.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera wartość wskazującą, czy <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> skojarzonego z tym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" /> wyłączeniu ekranu.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> is collapsed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Jeśli <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> zwinięte, a w przeciwnym razie <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: Ten interfejs API nie jest zaimplementowana.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> allows more than one child element to be selected concurrently.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera wartość, która określa, czy <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> zezwala na więcej niż jeden element podrzędny, należy wybrać jednocześnie.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> we wszystkich przypadkach.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Ten element jest jawną implementacją członków.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Można go używać tylko wtedy, gdy <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer> wystąpienia jest rzutowane na <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interfejsu.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> requires at least one child element to be selected.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera wartość, która określa, czy <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> wymaga co najmniej jeden element podrzędny, należy wybrać.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> we wszystkich przypadkach.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Ten element jest jawną implementacją członków.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Można go używać tylko wtedy, gdy <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer> wystąpienia jest rzutowane na <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interfejsu.
